data.name: plToolbarSet.Help
data.value: Set the toolbar order preference. The role will be verified against this order from top to bottom. If none toolbar matches current user roles, the last toolbar will be used (Bottom one)

data.name: plToolbarSkin.Help
data.value: Custom toolbar skin for this instance

data.name: plToolbarRoles.Text
data.value: View roles for the selected toolbar

data.name: plToolbarRoles.Help
data.value: Select all roles with view access to this toolbar

data.name: plToolbarDisabled.Help
data.value: Select to disable selected toolbar. (If all toolbars are disabled, then last one will be used

data.name: imgUpdateRoles.Text
data.value: Update selected toolbar (Modify options below first)

data.name: plSettingsType.Help
data.value: Select the type of setting to modify

data.name: plToolbarNotExpanded.Help
data.value: Select to make your toolbar not expanded when entering editor

data.name: plApplyTo.Help
data.value: Select where to apply custom settings

data.name: plLinkBrowserTheme.Help
data.value: Theme used bu the link browser window

data.name: plEnhancedSecurity.Help
data.value: Will try to use added basic rules for anti-spam (can prevent including some content type)

data.name: dshAvailableStyles.Text
data.value: List of available styles for the editor

data.name: plStyleMode.Help
data.value: Determines how the style list will be generated

data.name: plStyleFilter.Help
data.value: When in dynamic mode, you can filter your styles

data.name: plPortalStyle.Help
data.value: Specifies a custom file to be used for you styles list

data.name: plCssMode.Help
data.value: Determines how the css file will be generated

data.name: plPortalCss.Help
data.value: Specifies a custom css file to be used for your editor area

data.name: plFullImagePath.Help
data.value: Replaces image path with a complete path including the server

data.name: toolbarTip.Text
data.value: Tip: Put most complex toolbar firs and then go down with others

data.name: plForceWidth.Help
data.value: Forces editor width to a specific size

data.name: plForceHeight.Help
data.value: Forces editor height to a specific size

data.name: plImageFolder.Help
data.value: Custom image folder to be used as the root folder for image and flash galleries. Editors must have READ access to this folder

data.name: cmdMakeAllUsers.Text
data.value: Make all toolbars available for all users (Needed if you don't want to modify roles)

data.name: plFontColors.Help
data.value: Comma separated list of hexadecimal values for colors. Leave it blank for default list

data.name: plFontNames.Help
data.value: You can include your own list of font names separated by a semicolon. remember that fonts must reside on the client computer. Leave it blank if you want to use the default list

data.name: plFontFormats.Help
data.value: A semicolon separated list of values. Each value must contain the format tag. For example: p;div;pre;address;

data.name: plFontSizes.Help
data.value: A semicolon separated list of values. Each value must contain two parts separated by a slash. For example: 1/xx-small;2/x-small;3/small. Leave it blank if you want to use the default list

data.name: UpdateError.Text
data.value: Error applying custom editor settings for {0}

data.name: CleanError.Text
data.value: Error removing custom editor settings for {0}
